actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 74.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept certain gifts on behalf of the United States Botanic Garden.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1989 to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to solicit and receive gifts as well as to dispose, use, obligate, expend, disburse, and administer them for the benefit of the U.S. Botanic Garden (including programs, duties, or functions of the Garden). (Current law authorizes the Architect only to accept gifts for such purpose.) Authorizes the Architect to accept personal services, including educationally related work assignments for students in nonpay status, if the service is to be rendered without compensation.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Architect of the Capitol to accept certain gifts on behalf of the United States Botanic Garden.
